page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: FIRST THING I GET UP AND WASH, DRESS AND HAVE BREAKFAST OF BACON AND EGGS THEN I FEED CHICKENS AND CATS AND MILK THE GOATS,FEED THE LAMB AND GOLD FISH. I GO BACK IN THE HOUSE TO WASH THE BREAKFAST THINGS, CLEAN UP WITH AN ELECTRIC VACUUM CLEANER AND AEROSOL POLISH. I GO UP STAIRS TO MAKE THE BEDS AND CLEAN THE BED ROOMS.THE BEDS HAVE INTERIOR SPRING MATTRESSES AND SHEETS AND BLANKETS OR A FEATHER FILLED DUVET. THE BAKER AND GROCER COME IN VANS AND I CHOOSE WHAT I NEED. THEY COME TWICE A WEEK FROM THE LOCAL TOWN. PAPERS ARE DELIUERED DAILY. MILK IS DELIVERED FOUR TIMES A WEEK.A BUTCHER VISITS THE VILLAGE ONCE A WEEK. ON TUESDAYS THE LIBRARY VAN VISITS THE VILLAGE AND A NUMBER OF THE ADULTS USE THIS SERVICE. I WORK IN THE GARDEN FOR AN HOUR OR SO.
